confirmTerms: By clicking login you agree to our $t(common:termsAndConditions) & $t(common:privacyPolicy)
faqs.title: FAQs
forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.instructions: No problem! Enter your e-mail address & we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.emailSubmittedInfo: If this email address exists, you will receive a link via email to reset your password. Didn't receive the email? Please check your spam folder, click below to resend the email or try another email address.
password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters.
password.match: Those passwords didn't match. Please try again.
password.incorrect: Oops, this is not your current password. Please try again.
